content: designed for my friend dennis a guy who likes things that are useful not things that are fancy these socks are intended to fit well wear well and look sharp not flashy hey who doesn t want socks like that of course gentle knitter i ve thought of you as well - this is an easy knit that isn t boring and will be appreciated by whoever you may give them to knit from the top down the sock is covered in a nice balanced rib that should please guys who don t want much texture and knitters who don t want to knit plain socks there is a second option that adds just a little more texture for more adventurous sock wearers or knitters who aren t as keen on plain rib constructed with a standard with a heel flap heel that continues the rib pattern onto the heel and instructions for running the rib right up to the tip of the toe if you like pattern includes both charts and written instructions pattern includes 64 68 and 72 st sizes additional technical support is also available through e-mail consultation 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/joeys-house/2823591/1-25#16
